Name: Space Pirate Amai
About the game: Embrace Space Piracy with this retro style space shooter. Join Space Pirate Amai and her crew on a quest to destroy everything in her path! Old school 2d shooter with crazy music by the indie band 8bit Phantom Galactic! -Challenging retro space shooter -Fight your way through various stages and enemies. -Intense Boss fights! -Master the use of your shield to survive. -Use powerups to upgrade your ship's weapons!
